content: >this pattern is available also on payhip 1 with pay what you want option this is an extended and slightly modified version of the keväthuuma /patterns/library/kevathuuma sock pattern that is designed for sport weight yarns and has one size 54 sts only **pattern features ** - designed for **fingering** weight yarns - instructions written in metric and us terminology - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - four sizes extra-small 54 sts small 60 sts medium 66 sts and large 72 sts - heel flap in the sole and gusset decreases at the back of the heel - mirrored charts provided for the left and right sock - charts but no written instructions for the cabled pattern 1 https //payhip com/b/4ulj7
